TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MemberCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase
Public MustInherit Class MemberCodeDomSerializer Inherits CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 提供用于序列化对象图内的反射基元的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for serializing a reflection primitive within the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个"元"序列化程序; 也就是说，是不序列化对象图的一部分，但改为序列化对象图内的反射基元的序列化程序。The class is a "meta" serializer; that is, is a serializer that does not serialize part of the object graph, but instead serializes a reflection primitive within the object graph. 例如，将与之关联以使其进行序列化属性。For example, a would be associated with a in order for it to serialize a property. 对象启用构造，如属性和事件，以符合逻辑，而无需在代码中有物理备份。 objects enable constructs, such as properties and events, to be logical, rather than requiring them to have a physical backing in code. 与不同类，对象必须能够反序列化。Unlike classes, objects must be able to deserialize.

summary.span: 将给定值的给定成员说明符序列化为一个语句集合。

span.span: Serializes the given member descriptor on the given value to a statement collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实际上执行序列化。This method actually performs the serialization. 该成员进行序列化时必要的语句将添加到语句集合。When the member is serialized the necessary statements will be added to the statements collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`true`如果应序列化给定的成员说明符，或`false`如果无需序列化该成员。This method returns `true` if the given member descriptor should be serialized, or `false` if there is no need to serialize the member.
